pullrequest.title: Check if a parameter value is empty before accessing them in type specific getter functions (solves issue #347)

content.raw: Perhaps we can print a warning or an error if this->value turns out to be empty. Also, it would also be nice to update the SDF_Test.cc file to test this functionality. I can assist with these tasks if you'd like help.
content.html: Perhaps we can print a warning or an error if this->value turns out to be empty. Also, it would also be nice to update the SDF_Test.cc file to test this functionality. I can assist with these tasks if you'd like help.
